attemptCount.description: Number of submission attempts by the user

bestScore.description: Best score achieved by the user (percentage of passed tests)

x-enum-comments.PermissionManage: PermissionManage represents full access (edit + manage collaborators).

x-enum-descriptions: PermissionManage represents full access (edit + manage collaborators).

get.description: Get all collaborators for a specific contest. Users with edit permission or higher can see collaborators.

post.description: Add a user as a collaborator to a contest with specified permissions (edit or manage). Only users with manage permission can add collaborators.
post.summary: Add a collaborator to a contest

delete.description: Remove a user's collaborator access to a contest. Only users with manage permission can remove collaborators. Cannot remove the creator.
delete.summary: Remove a collaborator from a contest

put.description: Update the permission level of a collaborator for a contest. Only users with manage permission can update collaborators.

get.description: Get all collaborators for a specific task. Users with edit permission or higher can see collaborators.

post.description: Add a user as a collaborator to a task with specified permissions (edit or manage). Only users with manage permission can add collaborators.
post.summary: Add a collaborator to a task

delete.description: Remove a user's collaborator access to a task. Only users with manage permission can remove collaborators. Cannot remove the creator.
delete.summary: Remove a collaborator from a task

put.description: Update the permission level of a collaborator for a task. Only users with manage permission can update collaborators.

post.description: Logs in a user with email and password, returns JWT tokens
Logs out a user by clearing the refresh token cookie
Refreshes JWT tokens using a valid refresh token from cookie
Registers a user with name, surname, email, username and password, returns JWT tokens

get.description: Get global contests accessible to the (ongoing, upcoming, past) with pagination metadata
Get all contests where the current user is the creator or has collaborator access (view, edit, or manage) with pagination metadata
get.summary: Get contests manageable by the current user

get.description: Get all pending registration requests for a specific contest (only accessible by contest creator or admin)
get.summary: Get registration requests for a contest

get.description: Get all submissions for a specific contest. Only accessible by teachers (contest creators) and admins.
Get aggregated statistics for each task in a contest (for contest creators or admins)
get.summary: Get task statistics for a contest

get.description: Get all tasks associated with a specific contest

post.description: Add an existing task to a specific contest
post.summary: Add a task to a contest

get.description: Get per-user statistics for a task in a contest (for contest/task creators or admins)
get.summary: Get user statistics for a specific task in a contest

get.description: Get all submissions for a user on a task in a contest with filtering (for contest/task creators or admins)

parameters.description: Limit the number of returned submissions
parameters.name: limit

get.summary: Get submissions for a specific user, task, and contest

get.description: Get all tasks that are NOT yet assigned to the specified contest (admin/teacher only)
get.summary: Get available tasks for a contest

get.description: Get overall performance statistics for all users (or a specific user) in a contest (for contest creators or admins)
get.summary: Get overall user statistics for a contest

get.description: Get all contests created by the currently authenticated user with pagination metadata
get.summary: This endpoint is deprecated and will be removed in future versions. Please use the /contests-management/contests endpoint instead.

get.description: Get contest details by ID

post.description: Create a pending registration for a contest (requires contest creator approval)

get.description: Get results of the current user for a given contest, including attempt count, best result, and best submission ID for each task
get.summary: Get user's results for a contest

get.description: Get visible tasks for a contest with optional status filter (past, ongoing, upcoming). Only accessible by participants or users with access policy.
get.summary: Get contest tasks with optional status filter

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific task within a contest
get.summary: Get a specific task from a contest

get.description: Get tasks associated with a specific contest including best score and attempt count for the current user
get.summary: Get tasks for a contest with submission statistics

get.description: Get contests for a user (returns ongoing, past, upcoming)
get.summary: Get contests for a user (combined - deprecated; use /contests/my/active or /contests/my/past)

get.description: Active contests = started AND not finished (ongoing)
get.summary: Get active contests for the current user

get.description: Past contests = contests whose end time has elapsed
get.summary: Get past contests for the current user

get.description: Get all groups
Get a group
Get users in a group

Get submissions with optional filters by userId, contestId, and/or taskId. Students can only view their own submissions. Teachers can view submissions for tasks/contests they created. Admins have full access.

parameters.description: Limit the number of returned submissions
parameters.name: limit

get.summary: Get all submissions with optional filtering

get.description: If the user is a student, the submission must belong to the user.
Get all available languages for submitting solutions.
If the user is a student, it fails with 403 Forbidden.

parameters.description: Limit the number of returned submissions
parameters.name: limit

get.summary: Get all submissions for a user

post.description: The solution is uploaded to the FileStorage service and a submission is created in the database.

parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Limit the number of returned submissions
parameters.name: limit

get.summary: Get all submissions for a user

get.description: Returns all tasks

post.description: Uploads a task to the FileStorage service

get.description: Gets task limits by task ID

put.description: Updates task limits by task ID

get.description: Gets all tasks created by the current user with pagination metadata
Returns a task by ID
Returns all live tasks assigned to the current user, grouped by contests with submission statistics
Get all users
Get user by ID
Get current user

post.description: Triggers queue reconnection and processes pending submissions (admin only)

get.description: Returns the current status of the queue connection and pending submissions
Returns the current status of all worker nodes

401.description: Not authorized - requires teacher or admin role

504.description: Gateway timeout - worker status request timed out
